items.title: When, where, and how to watch #9 Notre Dame VS Syracuse Orange
items.summary: Notre Dame is back home for Senior Day, and a familiar senior day foe… the Syracuse Orange. The Irish have some work to do over the next two weeks to solidify, and possibly even improve, their college football playoff position. They also have an opportunity to really help make the Heisman case for Jeremiyah Love […]

items.title: How Notre Dame’s opponents fared in week 12 of the college football season
items.summary: Notre Dame got off to a rough start in 2025, but they looked like they fixed a few things in a 56-30 win over the Purdue Boilermakers and then the 56-13 win on the road against the Arkansas Razorbacks. They followed those two victories with two victories which covered massive spreads in a 28-7 win […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football Stats: Week 12 Review of Win over Pitt
items.summary: Notre Dame football survived a wild CFB weekend with a 37-15 win over Pitt.  This is the Irish’s eighth straight victory and they are 8-2 heading into the season’s final two games.  From 30,000 feet, it’s as good of a win as you could ask for but lets see what nuggets we can pull from […]

items.title: Will the College Football Playoff committee keep Notre Dame at #9 this week?
items.summary: The latest set of rankings from the AP Top 25 and Coaches Poll were released on Sunday, and Notre Dame found themselves ranked #9 again in both polls. Oklahoma’s win over Alabama catapulted the Sooners over the Irish and set the Crimson Tide right behind the Irish. Some (including myself) doubted that the voters would […]
